summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3950 for the improvement of West Barrett Street from a connection with existing sewer on 10th Avenue West and 9th Avenue West, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48144, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
